headline: Royal Caribbean (RCL): Exploring Valuation After Recent Share Price Volatility
summary: Shares of Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL) have been choppy this month, which gives investors a fresh look at the stock's valuation compared to recent performance. Over the past month, the stock fell 18%. See our latest analysis for Royal Caribbean Cruises. While the past month has been turbulent for Royal Caribbean Cruises' share price, the bigger picture is much stronger, with a 1-year total shareholder return of about 7.7% and a remarkable 3-year total return of over 325%. Recent choppiness...
